full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Information

* **Title (English):** Specialized Trucking Services
* **Title (French):** Services de remorques spécialisées
* **Reference Number:** WS3994765312-Doc3996033237
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3994765312

### Tender Details

* **Publications Date:** 2023-05-16
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-05-26
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2025-07-31T14:00:00 ET
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2025-10-22
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-10-31

### Tender Status

* **Status (English):** Open
* **Status (French):** Ouvert

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Delivery Regions

* **United States of America**
* **Canada**

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Elisan, Christine (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** christine.elisan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description

A solicitation for specialized trailer services has been issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). The successful supplier will provide transportation services throughout Canada and the United States, including locations within Comprehensive Land Claim Settlement Areas. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 2025-10-31 at 14:00 ET. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive. The solicitation reference number is WS3994765312-Doc3996033237.

**Notes:**
*   Please disregard the original closing time posted on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys.
*   All submissions must be received by 14:00 ET on 2025-10-31.
*   Bids submitted after 14:00 ET will be deemed non-responsive.**Rewritten Entry:** 

###
